messages.title: ELECTION COMMUNICATION
messages.content: I understand the frustrations people have as I've seen this constituency being run into the ground by the Tories, with the loss of local bus and hospital services.

issues.education: I am father to a wonderful son who I don't want disadvantaged by our current education system.
issues.health: I understand the frustrations people have as I've seen this constituency being run into the ground by the Tories, with the loss of local bus and hospital services.

leaflet.personalStatement: I live and work in Boston and always have done. I am a national Trade Union GMB representative in Asda Boston. I am father to a wonderful son who I don't want disadvantaged by our current education system. I know what it's like to try and live on a low income. I understand the frustrations people have as I've seen this constituency being run into the ground by the Tories, with the loss of local bus and hospital services.

images.caption: Ben Cook - Labour Party Candidate for Boston and Skegness
